#labels Featured
= Object Definitions =

*Topic* (dom: !TopicList)
{{{
  String title,
  DateString start,
  DateString end,
  String color,
  Array bounds: {
    n: String,
    s: String,
    e: String,
    w: String
  }
}}}
  
*Event* (dom: does not appear)
{{{
  int uid,
  DateString start,
  DateString end,
  String color (inherits),
  String location,
  String title,

  Array Polygons polygons,
  Marker marker,
  
  Function getOverlays(),
  Function show(),
  Function hide()
}}}
  
*Marker* (dom: !LabeledMarker)
{{{
  String title (inherits),
  String lat,
  String lng,
  String blurb,
  UrlString icon
  
  Event off: label with title and icon
  Event over: showBlurb(), bringTOFront()
  Event click: (showDetailedBlurb())
}}}
   
*Polygon*
{{{
  Array coords: 
    [
      Array(String lat, String lng),
      Array(String lat, String lng)
    ]
  ColorString color (inherits),
  ColorString borderColor (computed?),
  String title (inherits),
  
  Event off: show polygon
  Event over: showLabel()
}}}
